page.title: 14Dunchurch Village,Rugby
page.content: Grid ref.485713 { Dunchurch}is a small but old village. It has 19 small shops,all of which are quite old,a general food store,Yates ladies clothes,Websters Wool,Coffee Bean cake shop,Baumbers butchers,John Cookes estate agent,Midland Bank,craft shops,antiques,post office,fish'n'chip shop,hairdressers,Tudor Cafe,video shop,restaurant and The Wine Cellar. { Dunchurch}has some historic buildings including Guy Fawkes' House, the Dun Cow Hotel and the Thatched Cottage Restaurant.It also has a set of stocks and a market cross.The Green Man pub has a secret tunnel which leads to Guy Fawkes'House where Guy Fawkes hid some explosives. { Dunchurch}is quite busy because it has an important crossroads at its centre.
